ValidationRule.description: This rule will not allow a user to save a record if he is selecting Outcome="Future Date Request" and not filling any data in "Next Task Due Date Time Field".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Outcome__c , "Future Date Request"), ISBLANK(Next_Task_Due_Date_Time__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Next Task Due Date Time is required when Outcome is Future Date Request
